definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
protective umbrella/fig. person affording protection (esp. corrupt)

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4
yi1 lei4 bao3 hu4 dong4 wu4
Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Huan2 jing4 Bao3 hu4 Zong3 ju2
containing_words.word: 中国国家环境保护总局

definition: Yitong nature reserve in Yitong Manchurian autonomous county 伊通滿族自治縣|伊通满族自治县, Siping, Jilin
pinyin: Yi1 tong1 zi4 ran2 bao3 hu4 qu1

sentences.english: Shen Cheng is a project official with the animal-protection group ACTAsia.
sentences.chinese: 沈成，动物保护组织“行动亚洲”项目官员。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: There's something about being extroverted that seems to protect people.
sentences.chinese: 性格外向的人有某种东西似乎在保护他们。

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 电机过热时，热保护器将会中断电流。

sentences.english: All kinds of protective device make sure tranverse mobile platform safe running .
sentences.chinese: 多种安全保护装置保证移车平台安全运行。

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗马增加了橡胶脚趾地带，以保护您的岩石和根源。

sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合阀盖保护阀远离灰尘和碎片，包括内置咬气门芯。

sentences.english: Lipoic Acid is a powerful anti-oxidant and helps protect the brain.
sentences.chinese: 硫辛酸是一种强有力的抗氧化剂有助于保护大脑。

sentences.english: Proper sealing and protection of material carton after usage or opening by IQC or warehouse operator.
sentences.chinese: IQC或仓管员开箱或取用物料后正确封箱和保护。

sentences.english: There ◎ over-temperature protection device, safer and more at ease.
sentences.chinese: 内设过温保护装置，更安全，更放心。

sentences.english: So, how much is that going to cost?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这样的保护套花去了多少钱呢？

sentences.english: The pages to perform the maintenance should be password protected.
sentences.chinese: 执行维护的页面应该有口令保护。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 并且对于易受伤害患者予以优先照顾和妥善保护。

sentences.english: But Cho refused to accept that, not wanting to lose the protectorate .
sentences.chinese: 但乔拒绝接受这一切，他不想失去保护权。

sentences.english: Tear ducts operate on a normal basis to lubricate and protect the eye.
sentences.chinese: 泪管通常可以湿润并保护眼睛。

sentences.english: And finally let's pass by the Waterbird Refuge.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们经过了水鸟保护区。

definition: to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to avoid suffering/to prevent (sth bad)/to protect against (damage)/immunity (from prosecution)/freedom (from pain, damage etc)/exempt from punishment
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
